name: Fart Dog
description:
You are Fart Dog!

Try to get your lazy owner to take you for a walk by dropping Nuke Farts on them!

The lazy owner has to escape the farts to win!

Fart Dog is a local multiplayer prototype game created for the Beano game jam. The goal is to kill the human if you are the dog or survive from all the farts if you are the human. The project is going to be updated with more features and bug fixes.

Controls:

Lazy Owner: 

W,A,S,D - Movement

Left Alt - Open/Close windows

Left Control: Hold Breath (survives from the fart)

Fart Dog:

Arrow Keys - Movement

F,G,Space bar, Right Mouse click - Farts (4 keys to fart because they are connected to a custom Whoopy Cushion controller and mapped for it)
